value.title: Core Cloud Services - Manage services with the Azure portal
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure cloud platform through the Azure portal, where you create and manage all of your Azure resources.

value.title: Train a machine learning model with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure Machine Learning to train a model and register it in a workspace.

value.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Translate speech with the speech service
value.excerpt: Perform speech translation tasks with the speech service to translate spoken text to different languages.

value.title: Understand data warehouse developer features of Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Understand data warehouse developer features of Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Upload your project by using GitHub best practices
value.excerpt: Learn to upload your existing project to GitHub.

value.title: Use data loading best practices in Azure Synapse Analytics
value.excerpt: Use data loading best practices in Azure Synapse Analytics

value.title: Use entity behavior analytics in Azure Sentinel
value.excerpt: Use entity behavior analytics in Azure Sentinel

value.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: There are a variety of commonly used SAP-certified operating systems supported by SAP running on Azure VMs, and there are also several different methods of provisioning storage for SAP workloads in Azure. In this module, you will learn the SAP recommended support products and VM types as well as the network, database, and monitoring requirements.

value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Learn how to create transactions, manage memory, and use the cache-aside pattern with Azure Cache for Redis

value.title: Introduction to Windows Virtual Desktop in Microsoft Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Windows Virtual Desktop to deliver remote desktop and remote app experiences in Microsoft Azure.

value.title: Deploy applications by using MSIX app attach for Windows Virtual Desktop
value.excerpt: Learn how to deliver applications using MSIX app attach technology. MSIX app attach is an application delivery technology that separates applications and their state from the operating system and assigns applications to users dynamically.

value.title: An introduction to decentralized identities | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Danny Strockis joins Scott Hanselman to discuss decentralized identity, which gives users ownership of their digital identities and data by leveraging permissionless distributed ledgers.  04:07 - Authentication concept 10:30 - Demo  Decentralized identity – Own your own identity https://aka.ms/azfr/566/01

value.title: An overview of Azure Integration Services | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Integration Services brings together API Management, Logic Apps, Service Bus, and Event Grid as a reliable, scalable platform for integrating on-premises and cloud-based applications, data, and processes across your enterprise. [04:41] Demo Start   Azure Integration Services overview https://aka.ms/azfr/527/01

value.title: Anomaly detection using machine learning in Azure Stream Analytics | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Stream Analytics is a fully managed serverless offering on Azure. With the new Anomaly Detection functions in Stream Analytics, the whole complexity associated with building and training custom machine learning (ML) models is reduced to a simple function call resulting in lower costs, faster time

value.title: Azure AD Managed Service Identity | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Arturo Lucatero joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure AD Managed Service Identity, which can be used to authenticate to any service that supports Azure AD authentication. For more information, see: What is Managed Service Identity (MSI) for Azure resources? (docs): https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/managed-service-identity/overview

value.title: Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes with GitOps | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Lior Kamrat shows Scott Hanselman how Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes provides an easy way to apply GitOps configurations on Kubernetes clusters deployed outside of Azure, which enables you to control and govern those clusters and applications using GitHub repositories as the "single source of truth."

value.title: Azure Container Registry Tasks: Build and deploy to Azure App Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Steve Lasker joins Scott Hanselman to talk about Azure Container Registry (ACR) Tasks and how you can build your container images in Azure for the three phases of development: pre-commit, team commits, and post-development for OS & Framework Patching. [01:03] Demo Start   For more information:  Azure

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Backup
value.excerpt: Even though Azure takes three copies of your virtual machines and stores them in Azure Storage, you still need to protect your data against ransomware, corruption, or accidental deletion. Kelly Anderson stops by to chat with Scott Hanselman about how simple it is to set up Azure Backup, how its built-in

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure Batch Rendering Service
value.excerpt: Dave Fellows joins Donovan Brown to chat about a new service called Azure Batch Rendering, which is built on the Azure Batch service to provide capabilities for rendering 3D graphics for film and other visual media projects. The service provides pay-per-use licensing of the commercial applications commonly

value.title: Azure Security Center – Just-in-Time Network Access
value.excerpt: Cloud hosted VM’s are prime targets for RDP and SSH brute force attacks because management ports are typically left in an open state. With Just in Time network access, you can put any of your ports, not just management ports, into a default deny state until a user requires access. Once access is requested,

value.title: Best way to start Power Apps for a non-professional developer? | One Dev Question: Dona Sarkar
value.excerpt: Sometimes services like Power Apps can be daunting. In the One Dev Question series, Principal Cloud Advocate Dona Sarkar shares some tips for getting started and explains why you do not have to be a professional developer to use Power Apps.   For more information, visit: https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/modules/get-started-with-powerapps/?WT.mc_id=onedevquestion-c9-donasa

value.title: Cloud security with Rob Polly
value.excerpt: A ten-part miniseries recounting the Microsoft journey to the cloud—told by the pioneers who took us there. Microsoft cloud security expert Rob Polly outlines the challenges Microsoft faced during the transition to the cloud, and how the company addressed additional concerns related to privacy and geopolitical

value.title: Continuous integration and deployment using Azure Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Gaurav Malhotra joins Scott Hanselman to discuss how you can follow industry-leading best practices to do continuous integration and deployment for your Extract Transform/Load (ETL) and Extract Load/Transform (ELT) workflows to multiple environments such as Dev, Test, Prod, and more. value.title: Discovering the Azure Architecture Center | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this episode of Azure Tips and Tricks, discover the Azure Architecture Center which is full of useful knowledge and resources.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks    Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today

value.title: Enabling secure remote work using Windows Virtual Desktop | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Windows Virtual Desktop (WVD) is a comprehensive desktop and app virtualization service running in Azure to enable secure remote work. Christiaan Brinkhoff joins Scott Hanselman to show how WVD is different from other desktop virtualization technologies, as well as how easy it is to implement and maintain.

value.title: Execute Jars and Python scripts on Azure Databricks using Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Gaurav Malhotra joins Lara Rubbelke to discuss how you can operationalize Jars and Python scripts running on Azure Databricks as an activity step in a Data Factory pipeline. value.title: How do Power Apps differ from Azure Logic Apps? | One Dev Question: Dona Sarkar
value.excerpt: Ever wondered the difference between Power Apps and Azure Logic Apps? In the One Dev Question series, Principal Cloud Advocate Dona Sarkar explains just how different they are.
